usefulItems: rolling pin, skillet or griddle pan, hob
title: Quick Flatbreads

ingredients.content: 350 g strong white bread flour, plus extra for rolling

preparations.content: Place flour, yoghurt, baking powder, salt and sugar in mixing bowl then mix <b>15 sec/speed 6<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula. Knead <b>1 min/<b>.
Tip dough out onto a lightly floured surface and bring together. Divide dough into 8 pieces using spatula then shape each into a ball. Roll dough out into a circle (approx. Ø 20 cm) each.
Heat a skillet or griddle pan and cook bread for 1 minute on each side. Serve immediately.
